data.description:
LAX VR is the ultimate first-person VR lacrosse experience, offering both Box and Field lacrosse modes including a new exhilarating 6v6 field game where you can play as either a field player or goalie. Game modes include: Field, Box, Braveheart, Shooting, Goalie, Longstick, Shoot Around, and Wall Ball. Our Medicine Game mode pays tribute to the Indigenous People who created lacrosse, set in a mythical historic environment. Hone your skills, customize your twig, and have fun in the immersive world of VR lacrosse.


One of the unique features of LAX VR is its touch controller physics system, which mimics the real-life feel of a lacrosse stick. In addition, LAX VR is a family-friendly game with no in-app purchases. You can enjoy the full game experience for a one-time cost, without worrying about additional costs or hidden fees.

LAX VR also allows players to compete with others globally via a leaderboard system. You can compare your skills with players from around the world and strive to reach the top of the leaderboard.

LAX VR is the ultimate VR lacrosse game that offers a fun and realistic gaming experience. The game's various modes, including the thrilling Box lacrosse mode, and Olympic format 6v6 field, provides opportunities for players to practice their skills and become better players.  And customize your twig with different colors for max drip!

changelog.change_log:
+ New Sixes Uni's.
+ Faster graphics performance.  Better FPS.
+ Nerfed the sixes goalie; easier to score.
+ Other improvements and bug fixes.

+ Updated goalie sticks. The stick inherits some of the custom colors and is a better shape.  We will keep improving it.
+ Our box goalie was able to trade in his old hockey leg guards for some new gear. 
+ In field 6v6 we improved the visuals.  The helms and your stick head now have a glossy finish.  Jerseys updated too.
+ Performance enhancements.
Performance and stability release.
Performance improvements and bug fixes!

November 15, 2023

- Custom sticks can now have 2 color heads.
- New  menu system.
- Performance improvements in the frame rate.
- Fixed bug in shooting challenge were ball would fly in unexpected direction (sorry about that).
- Fixed bugs in Medicine game that caused the stick to get stuck.
Added stick customizations.  Performance improvements were also made.
Updated visuals.  Added support for Quest 3.  Fixed a bug where the default shoot aim was the joystick rather than the headset.

+ Revamped Shooting skill mode
+ Cleaned up the main menu
+ Field goalie has been tweaked
+ Several other fixes and enhancements.
Field mode updated with improved AI and monthly event leaderboard added.  Small updates to box mode.  Addressed some glitches.

Field Mode 6v6 Has Arrived! - September 2023 This new game mode offers fast-paced action featuring goalie restarts immediately after a goal is scored. Take it to the rack or unleash a shot from our 2-point line. Choose your role: play as a field player or step into the crease as a goalie. We've also made several improvements to Box Mode, addressed a variety of glitches, and implemented minor enhancements across other modes. 

Sept 2nd - We published an update to resolve a few glitches in box and field mode.

Field Mode 6v6 Has Arrived! - September 2023 

This new game mode offers fast-paced action featuring goalie restarts immediately after a goal is scored. Take it to the rack or unleash a shot from our 2-point line. Choose your role: play as a field player or step into the crease as a goalie. We've also made several improvements to Box Mode, addressed a variety of glitches, and implemented minor enhancements across other modes.

Fixed a glitch where your teammates were dropping clearing passes from the goalie.

Field Mode 6v6 Has Arrived! - September 2023

This new game mode offers fast-paced action featuring goalie restarts immediately after a goal is scored. Take it to the rack or unleash a shot from our 2-point line. Choose your role: play as a field player or step into the crease as a goalie.

We've also made several improvements to Box Mode, addressed a variety of glitches, and implemented minor enhancements across other modes.

July 2023 - Box Mode Updated!

+ Both teams received new jerseys and better visuals.
+ The overall performance of the game has improved.
+ Players will now try to knockdown nearby passes.
+ Physics updated to improve player collisions.
+ Our arena was given a visual makeover as new performance gains allow for better visuals.
+ Our goalie is better at stopping jump shots.
+ We slightly increased some scoring metrics.
+ Fixed a bug that prevented some goals from being registered.
+ Addressed several other box glitches.

+ Some minor updates were also made to goalie mode to address some glitches and improve variability. 
+ Minor changes to our main menu.

Box:
 + the AI's decisions to pass or dodge have been improved.
 + the AI will now set very physical picks for the ball.
 + off-ball in settled offense the AI will move around to more spots.
 + Fixed bug where clock runs a few seconds after the goal

Reworked the Leaderboard and Achievement screens
Added achievements and leaderboards for all time box goals and wins
Improvements made to the main menu screen.

Speed of AI in Medicine game was lowered significantly.
Gameplay improvements made to braveheart mode
New sneak shots in goalie mode
Adjusted attacker speed and dodge speed in defender mode.

Box Lacrosse has come to LAX VR!!!

June 8, 2023: Box Mode Updates include:

+ Added diving shots for the AI players.
+ Fixed an issue where the AI would pass unnecessarily when they should have gone to the rack.
+ AI will do much less pull back passing; especially if not covered.
+ Goalie sticks given new mesh kits.
+ Updated scoring metrics for box mode
+ Updated arena environment and lighting to make ball pop a bit more
+ Fixed: Ball wasn't showing in goalie's stick
+ AI now has a chance to fake of goalies in tight
+ Re-worked how the AI navigates around the crease.
+ Nerfed long distance shots by the AI.
+ Fixed an issue where goalie was triggering an own goal.
+ Goalie chirps others after goal.

Introducing Box Mode!  Full 6v6 box games have arrived to LAX VR! 
This update also includes a base score increase to all other modes for those trying to crack the leaderboards!

April 2023

Added "The Medicine Game", an homage to lacrosse's Native American origins.  This game mode tests your scooping and scoring abilities, using a traditional wood stick, while dodging opponents from the past.

March 3, 2023

+ Updated the movement and throwing mechanics for all game modes.  
+ Shooting mode is much more movement friendly and now requires you to cut to a spot using movement instead of being auto-moved.
+ Improved the ball physics to be more reaslistic and consistent across game modes.
+ Added a way to reset the shot aim target by pressing on the right thumbsitck.
+ Added an option to move the shot aim target by using the right thumbstick instead of the headset.
+ Added an option to switch the movement controller to the right thumbstick.
+ Updated the main menu and leaderboard screens.
+ Fixed  bugs in braveheart mode that was allowing too many goals to be scored against the AI goalie.
+ Fixed a bug in defender mode that caused some animation glitches.  
+ Reduced the time in between reps in defender mode to quicken the game.
+ Reduced the time in between reps in shooting mode.
+ Shooting mode is much more movement friendly and now requires you to cut to a spot using movement instead of being auto-moved.
+ Updated the goal targets in shooting mode and shoot around to be more like the ones we have in our backyard goal which look similiar to the ECD ones.
+ Increased all the base scores so there is a good opportunity for people to climb the leaderboards.
+ Added a longstick to wall ball mode.
+ Upgraded some of the internal software components, which should help future versions.
Braveheart Mode Release 2:  Added features and addressed some glitches.  Bounce shots now easier to aim/shoot in all modes.

Version 1.4 

Braveheart mode is now in preview. 

Take the faceoff, get the groundball and beat your opponent. First to put the ball in the net wins. Happy Holidays!
